title: Corporate Travel Services signs multi-year contract with AmadeusTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Corporate Travel Services signs multi-year contract with Amadeus Published on : Monday, August 17, 2015
Amadeus today announces a contract renewal with long-standing customer Corporate Travel Services Pte Ltd (CTS), one of the leading full-service travel management companies in Singapore with an annual turnover of USD120 million.Amadeus has been CTS’ sole GDS partner since 1999, supporting the company’s growth and success over the years.
Jaslyn Toh, Group CEO of Corporate Travel Services, said, “Amadeus has played a critical role in our business growth over the past 16 years and together we look forward to continuing that success. Our corporate clients value our comprehensive range of travel content and solutions, as well as the fact that we take a tailored approach to meeting their specific needs, whatever the size of their business or complexity of their travel requirements. By equipping our team with leading-edge Amadeus technology, we will continue to provide our clients with the best service, cost-savings, and the world’s richest travel content.”
Under the deal, CTS will continue to provide their corporate clients with best-in-class solutions including Amadeus e-Travel Management (AeTM), an online self-booking tool that serves every aspect of corporations’ travel needs. With AeTM, CTS can offer a single entry point for their employees to plan, book and purchase complete travel itineraries within company guidelines.
The innovative Amadeus Offers tool will allow CTS to provide professional travel proposals to travellers in a matter of seconds, reducing the average time spent on trip management by as much as 60%, without the need to hold air or hotel inventory.
Albert Villadolid, Head of South East Asia for Distribution Commercial, Amadeus Asia Pacific, said, “We are so pleased to continue working with CTS, a long-time Amadeus partner. We are very much aligned in our vision, putting the traveller at the center of everything we do and taking a personalised approach to deliver the best service. Through this agreement, we renew our commitment to delivering the technology and innovation to CTS that will help them stay ahead of the curve.”
Established in 1988, CTS is today one of the leading full-service travel management companies in Singapore, with a staff strength of 85. CTS provides a comprehensive range of online and full-service travel solutions to respond to the diversified needs of corporations and small to medium-sized companies. Since October 2014, CTS has been a part of the GlobalStar Travel Management partner network comprising more than 80 market-leading agencies in over 75 countries with 3,500 office locations. CTS is a Tier 1 partner with a steering role in the GlobalStar organisation.
Source:-Amadeus
